title: Vision-based Learning for Drones: A Survey. (arXiv:2312.05019v2 [cs.RO] UPDATED)
abstract: Drones as advanced cyber-physical systems are undergoing a transformative shift with the advent of vision-based learning, a field that is rapidly gaining prominence due to its profound impact on drone autonomy and functionality. Different from existing task-specific surveys, this review offers a comprehensive overview of vision-based learning in drones, emphasizing its pivotal role in enhancing their operational capabilities under various scenarios. We start by elucidating the fundamental principles of vision-based learning, highlighting how it significantly improves drones' visual perception and decision-making processes. We then categorize vision-based control methods into indirect, semi-direct, and end-to-end approaches from the perception-control perspective. translated_title: 基于视觉学习的无人机：一项调查
translated_abstract: 作为先进的智能物理系统，无人机正在经历一次转型变革，采用基于视觉学习的技术，这个领域因其对无人机自主性和功能的深远影响而迅速崛起。不同于现有的特定任务调查，本文提供了一个全面概述了无人机中基于视觉学习的方法，强调其在各种场景下提高无人机操作能力中的关键作用。我们首先阐明了基于视觉学习的基本原理，突出了它如何显著提高无人机的视觉感知和决策过程。然后，从感知-控制的角度，我们将基于视觉的控制方法分为间接、半直接和端到端的方法。我们进一步探讨了具有视觉学习能力的无人机的各种应用，从单个智能体系统到更复杂的多智能体和异构系统的场景，并强调了挑战与创新。
tldr: 本文调查了基于视觉学习的无人机技术，指出其对无人机操作能力的关键作用，并提出了基于视觉学习的控制方法和各种应用的挑战与创新。
en_tdlr: This survey explores the vision-based learning techniques in drones, highlighting their pivotal role in enhancing drone operational capabilities, and discusses the challenges and innovations in vision-based control methods and various applications.
